meanings.sent1: The hungry dog was gormandising its food as if it hadn't eaten in days.
meanings.sent2: She was gormandising the delicious cake at the party.
meanings.sent3: The child was gormandising the candy so quickly, it seemed like a magic trick.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel was gormandising the nuts, storing them away for the winter.
meanings.sent5: The bear gormandising the honey was a sight to behold in the forest.

meanings.sent1: He was gormandising at the buffet, piling his plate high with food.
meanings.sent2: The king was known for gormandising at feasts, indulging in every dish.
meanings.sent3: The cat was gormandising on the treats, acting as if it had never been fed.
meanings.sent4: The politician was gormandising power, always seeking more influence.
meanings.sent5: The dragon gormandising gold in its lair was a sight to behold.
